WRITING.TEXT: I once played a match of dominion where am enemy warlord was in the middle of his team's score by only doing grabs and headbutts. He didn't use his sword once the entire match and still did okay. They lost though. Maybe it's some sort of challenge the warlord kids are doing these days?
There should be coop for a mode like this. I'm imagining Dawn of War 2's The Last Stand but in a Colloseum. Just hope you don't get executed.
Hopefully it gets fixed on the weekly addition?
I had a chat with Ubi support and linked this thread. He said he forwarded it to the team, so fingers crossed.
For me when it freezes it is right when a match ends as the voice says Victory or Defeat. I still get the rewards but need to end the game's process. Happens randomly.
